attributes.action: Use Her Majesty standing in the world to salvage the democratisation process in Democratic Republic of Congo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Eastern Congo is engulfed in a civil war that is costing loss of human lives on daily basis. As a major financial donor in terms of bilateral co-operation with Congo and having sharp relationship with rwanda, Her Majesty government needs to use its leverage lobbying the world leaders for a rethink on Congo crisis.The financial investment by Her Majesty government in the reconstruction of Congo will not pay off its dividends if lasting peace is not established through political means. While political solution is being engineered, additional troops to assist the displaced and impose a cease-fire is necessary in the short and medium term.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
